content: औत्सर्गिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ उत्सर्गष्ठञ्] {@--1@} That which is liable to be abolished in exceptional cases, though generally valid (as a rule of grammar). {@--2@} General (<ab>opp.</ab> to particular), not restricted {@--3@} Terminating, concluding. {@--4@} Leaving, quitting. {@--5@} Natural, inherent. {@--6@} Produced naturally or directly. {@--7@} Derivative.
